thread.title: Two LLamasoft Leaders Named to Supply & Demand Chain Executive’s 2018 Pros to Know

author: cnbc.com
title: Two LLamasoft Leaders Named to Supply & Demand Chain Executive’s 2018 Pros to Know

organizations.name: llamasoft leaders named to supply & demand chain executive

text:
Chris Schneider and Kevin Mooney recognized in annual list of industry’s top professionals
ANN ARBOR, Mich.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- LLamasoft , a global leader in supply chain optimization software and solutions, is proud to announce that Chris Schneider, Senior VP of Engineering, and Kevin Mooney, Vice President of Global Support – Customer Success, have been recognized by the leading supply chain publication, Supply & Demand Chain Executive, as 2018 Pros to Know . Schneider and Mooney were selected as Pros to Know for their achievements in helping customers overcome difficult supply chain challenges.
The Pros to Know Awards honor the supply chain executives who are leading initiatives that help prepare their company’s or customers’ supply chains for the significant challenges of today’s business climate. In its 17 th year, this annual list includes more than 200 individuals from software firms and service providers, consultancies or academia, who helped their supply chain clients, or the supply chain community at large, overcome these challenges.
“We are incredibly proud to have two LLamasoft executives named to Supply & Demand Chain Executive’s list of Pros to Know,” said Don Hicks, President and CEO of LLamasoft. “Both Chris and Kevin contribute significantly to LLamasoft as a whole – professionally and personally, and this achievement is a true testament to their work ethic and dedication to delivering the best possible business outcomes for our customers.”
“Supply & Demand Chain Executive congratulates the 2018 Supply & Demand Chain Executive Pros to Know recipients,” says John Yuva, editor of Supply & Demand Chain Executive. “We commend this year’s recipients for their achievements in supply chain and for paving the way for the next generation of exceptional supply chain leaders. This year’s recipients embody the commitment to transformative supply chain tools and processes, earning these individuals a rightful place in this year’s Pros to Know listing.”
About LLamasoft, Inc.
LLamasoft supply chain design software helps organizations worldwide design and improve their supply chain operations. LLamasoft solutions enable companies across a wide range of industries to model, optimize and simulate their supply chain network, leading to major improvements in cost, service, sustainability and risk mitigation. Headquartered in Ann Arbor, Michigan, LLamasoft is a leader in supply chain excellence and innovation, advancing technology focused on continuous improvement of enterprise supply chains for the world’s largest organizations.
